channel.title: world on SoBo's Dev Log
channel.description: Recent content in world on SoBo's Dev Log

item.title: Giara is a reddit app for Linux
item.description: I am a quite avid reddit user. Like it or not, reddit is a very central place where communities for stuff that I care about tend to aggregate. For the longest time, I have felt the need for a reddit app on my Linux desktop, and I waited and kept waiting for one that would finally allow me to break free of using the web version.

item.title: Feeds moved to World and design overhaul
item.description: It finally happened, Feeds is now part of the World group! Here’s the new repository! But don’t worry, I’ll keep up with the existing GitLab mirror. This doesn’t change too much in terms of development, but it surely makes the app more discoverable.
